detectors.description: ProxyToken.constructor(address,string,string,uint8,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#608-625) ignores return value by mint(owner,initialProxySupply * (10 ** uint256(decimals))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#615)

ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#321-327) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[from] = _balances[from].sub(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#324)
detectors.markdown:
[ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#L321-L327) can write the state variable array at will

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#214-216)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#223-225)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#233-235)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#242-245)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#256-262)

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.increaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#289-295)

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#307-313)

burn(uint256) should be declared external:
	- ProxyTokenBurnable.burn(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#447-454)

name() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Detailed.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#501-503)

symbol() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Detailed.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#508-510)

decimals() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Detailed.decimals() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UniversalGold.sol#515-517)
